verses.verse: Thou shalt not <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> any <S%H7794>bullock<s%>, or <S%H7716>sheep<s%>, wherein is <S%H3971>blemish<s%>, or any <S%H7451%H1697>evilfavouredness<s%>: for that is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

¶ If there be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you, within <S%H259>any<s%> of thy <S%H8179>gates<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee, <S%H376>man<s%> or <S%H802>woman<s%>, that hath <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, in <S%H5674>transgressing<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%>,

And hath <S%H3212>gone<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> them, either the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, or <S%H3394>moon<s%>, or any of the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, which I have not <S%H6680>commanded<s%>;

And it be <S%H5046>told<s%> thee, and thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it, and <S%H1875>inquired<s%> <S%H3190>diligently<s%>, and, behold, it be <S%H571>true<s%>, and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3559>certain<s%>, that such <S%H8441>abomination<s%> is <S%H6213>wrought<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

Then shalt thou bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> that <S%H376>man<s%> or that <S%H802>woman<s%>, which have <S%H6213>committed<s%> that <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%>, unto thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>, even that <S%H376>man<s%> or that <S%H802>woman<s%>, and shalt <S%H5619>stone<s%> them with <S%H68>stones<s%>, till they <S%H4191>die<s%>.

At the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>, or <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>, shall he that is worthy of <S%H4191>death<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>; but at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> he shall not be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

The <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> shall be <S%H7223>first<s%> upon him to put him to <S%H4191>death<s%>, and <S%H314>afterward<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%>. So thou shalt <S%H1197>put<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

¶ If there arise a <S%H1697>matter<s%> too <S%H6381>hard<s%> for thee in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, between <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%>, between <S%H1779>plea<s%> and <S%H1779>plea<s%>, and between <S%H5061>stroke<s%> and <S%H5061>stroke<s%>, being <S%H1697>matters<s%> of <S%H7379>controversy<s%> within thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>: then shalt thou <S%H6965>arise<s%>, and get thee <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>;

And thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and unto the <S%H8199>judge<s%> that shall be in those <S%H3117>days<s%>, and <S%H1875>inquire<s%>; and they shall <S%H5046>shew<s%> thee the <S%H1697>sentence<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%>:

And thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> according to the <S%H6310%H1697>sentence<s%>, which they of that <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> shall <S%H5046>shew<s%> thee; and thou shalt <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that they <S%H3384>inform<s%> thee:

According to the <S%H6310>sentence<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> which they shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> thee, and according to the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> which they shall <S%H559>tell<s%> thee, thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%>: thou shalt not <S%H5493>decline<s%> from the <S%H1697>sentence<s%> which they shall <S%H5046>shew<s%> thee, to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, nor to the <S%H8040>left<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> that will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2087>presumptuously<s%>, and will not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%> that <S%H5975>standeth<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> there before the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, or unto the <S%H8199>judge<s%>, even that <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%>: and thou shalt put <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and <S%H3372>fear<s%>, and do no more <S%H2102>presumptuously<s%>.

¶ When thou art <S%H935>come<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee, and shalt <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, and shalt <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein, and shalt <S%H559>say<s%>, I will <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> over me, like as all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are <S%H5439>about<s%> me;

Thou shalt in any <S%H7760>wise<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> over thee, whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>: one from <S%H7130>among<s%> thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> shalt thou <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> over thee: thou <S%H3201>mayest<s%> not <S%H5414>set<s%> a <S%H5237%H376>stranger<s%> over thee, which is not thy <S%H251>brother<s%>.

But he shall not <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> to himself, nor cause the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to the end that he should <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%>: forasmuch as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> unto you, Ye shall <S%H3254>henceforth<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> no more that <S%H1870>way<s%>.

Neither shall he <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> to himself, that his <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H5493>turn<s%> not away: neither shall he <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> to himself <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And it shall be, when he <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%>, that he shall <S%H3789>write<s%> him a <S%H4932>copy<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%> out of that which is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>:

And it shall be with him, and he shall <S%H7121>read<s%> therein all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life<s%>: that he may <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%> and these <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> them:

That his <S%H3824>heart<s%> be not lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> above his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and that he turn not <S%H5493>aside<s%> from the <S%H4687>commandment<s%>, to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, or to the <S%H8040>left<s%>: to the end that he may <S%H748>prolong<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> in his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%>, he, and his <S%H1121>children<s%>, in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
